page.title: 12LEISURE
page.content:
CLIFF-WALKING
Guernsey has very beautiful cliffs.There is a cliff path leading from La Prevote to St. Peter Port. This would take a day to walk. In our survey 12 people went cliff-walking.
SAILING
Sailing is popular with the rich people. These people do not need to work because they have retired with a lot of money.Guernsey have calm waters in the summer so attracting people to buy a boat. In the winter Guernsey has treacherous seas. People sail round the luxurious islands of Herm, Sark,Jethou and Jersey.
